DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate effect multiple dos Rifampin single dose pharmacokinetics Crizotinib healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Estimation Of Effect Of Rifampin On Pharmacokinetics Of Crizotinib In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female nonchild bear potential subject age 18 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m^2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Subjects evidence disease , condition affect drug absorption , treatment investigational drug within 30 day , history regular alcohol consumption , use prescription , nonprescription drug dietary supplement within 7 day , blood donation 500 mL within 56 day .
